definition: The word "führend" describes something or someone that is at the forefront or leading position in a particular field, industry, or domain. It is commonly used to refer to a person, organization, or product that is considered to be the leading or most influential in its respective area.

examples.german: Er ist einer der führenden Experten auf diesem Gebiet.
examples.english: He is one of the leading experts in this field.

examples.german: Das Unternehmen ist führend in der Branche.
examples.english: The company is a leader in the industry.

examples.german: Die führende Rolle des Landes in der Forschung wurde anerkannt.
examples.english: The country's leading role in research has been recognized.

examples.german: Sie ist eine der führenden Persönlichkeiten in der Politik.
examples.english: She is one of the leading figures in politics.

examples.german: Die führende Tageszeitung berichtete ausführlich über das Ereignis.
examples.english: The leading newspaper reported extensively on the event.
